subject: Re: Frank,
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I don't know about a brother, but there is a mystery sister. There are other Sumption families, and my Dad's relatives. 

F-S

>
> I have a file where a guy says you "speak Latin" Frank, another guy says,  
> his name is  Sumption too, by any chance do you have a brother over  there?  
> I will send you the file if you wish, once you have room.  sf
